tilemap_set_width: This function can be used to resize a tile map element. You give the tile map element ID (which you get when you create a tile map element using layer_tilemap_create() or when you use the function layer_tilemap_get_id()), and the new width of the tile map in tile cells.
The unique ID value of the tile map element to set the width of

{ANY_CODE} var lay_id = layer_get_id("Tiles_Walls");
var map_id = layer_tilemap_get_id(lay_id);
if tilemap_get_width(map_id) != room_width div 16
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}tilemap_set_width(map_id, room_width div 16);
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code checks the width of a specific tile map and if it is not the correct size then the width is set.
